dict.string: • In the top "date and time view" of the Alternate NC, tap on the "battery icon" to open the Battery Usage section in the Settings app. Tap on the "gear icon" to quickly open the Settings app. Tap on the "person icon" to open the Contacts app.
• Swipe down on the top "date and time view" to activate the "switches view" which contains various toggles and a brightness slider.
• Pressing these toggles will change them to "On or Off " depending on the state they are currently in.

• Tap on the labels underneath the toggles to launch the settings app which then goes to their respective pane. For example: Press the "Wi-Fi" label in AlternateNC to open the WiFi section in the Settings app.
• Swipe up on the "switches view" anytime to dismiss it, and see your notifications.
• Swipe "left" on any notification to dismiss it, and double tap on any lockscreen notification to "clear all notifications".
• If you enable the "clear all button" in preferences, it will display a white button in the bottom right corner of the Notification Center. Tapping on this button will clear all notifications.
